comment: "Festino", one of the syllogisms of Aristotelian logic. No ` ph ` is ` ps ` , and some ` ch ` is ` ps ` , therefore some ` ch ` is not ` ph ` . In Aristotelian notation, EIO-2: PeM and SiM therefore SoP. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 25-Nov-2016.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by BJ, 16-Sep-2022.)
